articles.author: Megan White
articles.title: Leclerc handed F1 Monaco GP grid penalty for impeding Norris - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Charles Leclerc has been handed a three-place grid penalty for Formula 1's Monaco Grand Prix for impeding Lando Norris in the tunnel.
articles.content:
The Ferrari driver appeared to slow in the tunnel as Norris' rapid McLaren approached from behind on a flying lap, forcing him to take evasive action.
Leclerc had been set to line up third for his h… [+2756 chars]

articles.author: Jake Boxall-Legge
articles.title: Alonso took "uncomfortable" risks in hunt for Monaco GP F1 pole - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Fernando Alonso admitted that his Monaco Grand Prix qualifying laps came with an "uncomfortable" amount of risk as he attempted to claim his first Formula 1 pole since 2012.
articles.content: The two-time champion headed a thrilling Q3 session at two points, but was pipped on both occasions by Max Verstappen as the Red Bull driver's prowess in the final sector decided pole in his favour.… [+2389 chars]
